Uses of Interface
org.vulcanium.configuration.Configuration

Packages that use Configuration
Package
Description
org.vulcanium.configuration
Classes dedicated to handling a plugin's runtime configuration.
org.vulcanium.configuration.file
Classes dedicated to facilitating configurations to be read and stored on the filesystem.

  • Uses of Configuration in org.vulcanium.configuration

    Classes in org.vulcanium.configuration that implement Configuration
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    MemoryConfiguration
    This is a Configuration implementation that does not save or load from any source, and stores all values in memory only.

    MemoryConfiguration(Configuration defaults)
